roleset.name: pay a pre-determined portion of a bill that is otherwise covered by insurance
roleset.note: COPAY-V, COPAYMENT-N NOTES: Added by Julia for AMR.

role.descr: insurance company paying the other portion

example.name: copay-v
example.text: For example, [some patients]-1 will be required *PRO*-1 to copay $15 for a regular check up

example.name: copayment-n
example.text: a 25 percent copayment of the approved charges on the part of retirees
